version_description:
• Weekly leaderboard competition – showcase your skills against the best in your country. Can you be the champion?
• Bigger courts with higher stakes – compete in new College Campus & Central Park locations.
• Cool new balls & items
• New minigames – including Free daily spin with awesome prizes
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Weekly leaderboard competition – showcase your skills against the best in your country. Can you be the champion?
• Bigger courts with higher stakes – compete in new College Campus & Central Park locations.
• Cool new balls & items
• New minigames – including Free daily spin with awesome prizes
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• All new top-level court, the Dubai Sky Terrace. Prove yourself!
• Rebalanced Lucky Ball, based on community feedback. Thank you!
• Cool new items – show off your gear!
• Improved connection, latency & matchmaking.
• Bug-fixes and performance enhancements.

• All new top-level court, the Dubai Sky Terrace. Prove yourself!
• Rebalanced Lucky Ball, based on community feedback. Thank you!
• Cool new items – show off your gear!

• We've added female characters!
• New wearables to collect and use!
• Send post-game messages to your opponents!
• View your opponents’ profiles and check out their stats!
• Share your achievements on Facebook!
• Bug fixes and improvements

Almost 20 million downloads worldwide! Thank you for your support!

• We've added female characters!
• New wearables to collect and use!
• Send post-game messages to your opponents!
• View your opponents’ profiles and check out their stats!
• Share your achievements on Facebook!
• Bug fixes and improvements

Almost 20 million downloads worldwide! Thank you for your support!

• PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS!! Your most requested feature now in!
• All-new tier – Tokyo Streets! Beat the best!
• Loads of new achievements – can you unlock them all?
• Save up to 3 different characters. Switch your style!
• Brand-new items to collect! Refresh your look!

• NEW GAME MODE: Career. An all-new story mode has been added! Are you ready to become the ultimate Basketball Star?
• NEW MINIGAME: Slam Dunks. It's showtime!
• Brand-new items have been added! Try a new look!
• New achievements to unlock!
• Performance improvements make for an even smoother game!

• NEW GAME MODE: Career. An all-new story mode has been added! Are you ready to become the ultimate Basketball Star?
• NEW MINIGAME: Slam Dunks. It's showtime!
• Brand-new items have been added! Try a new look!
• New achievements to unlock!
• Performance improvements make for an even smoother game!

• NEW MINIGAME: Crazy Hoops! Test your speed in this new arcade-style minigame!
• NEW FEATURE: Item Showcase! Get the best items with limited time offers!
• Up for a change of style? Try a randomised look in the character customisation page!
• Dunks Leaderboard for friends: show your friends who’s the Dunk King!
• New skill added! Max it out and become a Slam Dunk legend!
• Brand new achievements to unlock!
• Bug-fixes and performance improvements.

• The Happy Holidays Cup will take place in late-December, featuring a VIP Pass that will give you unlimited shots, gold, VIP Bags and several other prizes. Don’t forget: Collect Cups with your wins and display them on your profile forever!
• Play the Break the Ice Season and The Happy Holidays Cup event until mid January
